title: Why We Don't Need to #FreeMelania
abstract: Despite her husband’s repulsive nature, Melania Trump is not a victim.

title: Why Are We Still Talking About Kamala Harris's Outfits?
abstract: Harris has made headlines multiple times for her “remarkably unremarkable fashion.” But why is this a topic of conversation in the first place?

title: Biden Won—Now What?
abstract: Biden won the election, but there's still more work to be done.

title: Letter From the Election Issue Editor
